means: 照片，画像
图画，图片
影片
情景
构想，想象
描绘，画
描述

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"电影"之意。
means: cinema与the连用指(上映的)电影，电影工业；可指电影院；在英国与the连用还可指电影艺术。
film ： 指电影、影片，普通用词。
movie ： 美国英语中的口语用词。
picture ： 从原义指银幕或电视屏幕上的图像引申指影片。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"描写，描述"之意。
means: describe ： 侧重指描述细节，给读者或听众提供清晰的视觉图像。
represent ： 指有代表性或象征性地描述或讲述。
sketch ： 指快速地勾勒或概略地叙述。
picture ： 着重能够栩栩如生地把事物或场景等描绘出来。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都表示"画，图"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: drawing, illustration, cartoon, diagram, picture, sketch, painting, portrait
means: drawing ： 指用线条或色彩绘成的图画。
illustration ： 指插入书页之间帮助说明的任何插图或图解。
cartoon ： 指幽默或讽刺性漫画。
diagram ： 多指科技书籍或文献中具有概括解说作用的图表、图样或略图。
picture ： 指广义的"图画"，现多用来指相片、画像。
sketch ： 通常指只画出物体主要特征的图画。
painting ： 指着色的画。
portrait ： 指肖像，只用于指人。

word_mean: 各种图形和影像的总称。

sentence.Network_en: Police have released an E-fit picture of the suspected gunman.
sentence.Network_cn: 警方已公布持枪嫌犯的电子画像。

sentence.Network_en: The Sun had captioned a picture of Princess Diana "Princess of Veils"
sentence.Network_cn: 《太阳报》在黛安娜王妃的一张照片下写了一段说明文字——“披着面纱的王妃”。

sentence.Network_en: But as with other charitable bodies, these figures mask the true picture.
sentence.Network_cn: 但和其他慈善机构一样，这些数字掩盖了实情。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 这个在图片 (<pictures>) 与影片 (<videos>)也适用。这种方式也可以用来存取网路上的XNS伺服器与SMB伺服器。

第82届奥斯卡金像奖_百度百科 ... 最佳导演 DIRECTING 最佳影片（best picture） BEST PICTURE 拆弹部队（ The Hurt Locker）.
曾璜先是用《离家的孩子》厘定了图片故事（Picture Story）与当时主要是画报刊登的“摄影专题”之间的基本分野，阐释了什么是图片 …
所谓“世界图像”(world picture)，并不是关于世界的图像，而是世界以图像的方式被感知接受，这是现代所特有的现象，也是现代不同 …

jx.jx_en_mean: (chiefly N. Amer.)act in films or work for the film industry
soas to be no longer involved; irrelevant

lj.lj_ly: hostages were better left out of the picture.
lj.lj_ls: 最好不让人质知道底细。

jx.jx_en_mean: the embodiment of a specified state or emotion

lj.lj_ly: she looked a picture of health.
lj.lj_ls: 她仿佛就是健康的化身。

means.word_mean: 描绘;描写
其他释义

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin pictura, from pict- 'painted' (from the verb pingere)

encyclopedia.content: BMP格式 BMP是英文Bitmap（位图）的简写，它是Windows操作系统中的标准图像文件格式，能够被多种Windows应用程序所支持。随着Windows操作系统的流行与丰富的Windows应用程序的开发，BMP位图格式理所当然地被广泛应用。这种格式的特点是包含的图像信息较丰富，几乎不进行压缩，但由此导致了它与生俱生来的缺点--占用磁盘空间过大。所以，目前BMP在单机上比较流行。 GIF格式 GIF是英文Graphics Interchange Format（图形交换格式）

entry.def: A picture consists of lines and shapes which are drawn, painted, or printed on a surface and show a person, thing, or scene.

example.ex: A picture of Rory O'Moore hangs in the dining room at Kildangan.
example.tran: 一幅罗里·奥穆尔的画像挂在基尔丹根的餐厅里。

example.ex: ...drawing a small picture with coloured chalks.
example.tran: 用彩色粉笔画一张小画

example.ex: The tourists have nothing to do but take pictures of each other...
example.tran: 游客无事可做，只能互相拍照。

example.ex: The Observer carries a big front-page picture of rioters in a litter-strewn street.
example.tran: 《观察家报》在头版刊登了一张暴乱者聚集在满是垃圾的街头的大幅照片。

entry.def: Television pictures are the scenes which you see on a television screen.

example.ex: ...heartrending television pictures of human suffering.
example.tran: 令人心碎的人类遭受苦难的电视画面

entry.tran: （在报纸、杂志等上）登载…的照片（或图片）
entry.def: To be pictured somewhere, for example in a newspaper or magazine, means to appear in a photograph or picture.

example.ex: The golfer is pictured on many of the front pages, kissing his trophy as he holds it aloft.
example.tran: 许多报纸的头版上都刊登了那个高尔夫球手高高举起奖杯亲吻的照片。

example.ex: ...a woman who claimed she had been pictured dancing with a celebrity in Stringfellows nightclub...
example.tran: 宣称自己在斯特林费洛夜总会和某位名人跳舞的照片上了报纸的女子

entry.def: You can refer to a film as a picture .

example.ex: Warner Communications Inc. has refused to distribute the picture in the United States.
example.tran: 华纳通信公司已拒绝在美国发行这部电影。

example.ex: ...a director of epic action pictures.
example.tran: 史诗动作片的导演

entry.def: If you go to the pictures, you go to a cinema to see a film.

example.ex: We're going to the pictures tonight...
example.tran: 我们今晚要去看电影。

example.ex: I'd rather see it at the pictures than on video anyway.
example.tran: 我本来就宁可去电影院看，而不是看录像。

entry.tran: 想象；印象；心中的形象;头脑中的情景
entry.def: If you have a picture of something in your mind, you have a clear idea or memory of it in your mind as if you were actually seeing it.

example.ex: They have in their mind a picture of what an alcoholic should look like...
example.tran: 他们的心中有一个酒鬼应有的样子。

example.ex: We are just trying to get our picture of the whole afternoon straight...
example.tran: 我们只是想把整个下午的情形搞清楚。

entry.def: If you picture something in your mind, you think of it and have such a clear memory or idea of it that you seem to be able to see it.

example.ex: He pictured her with long black braided hair...
example.tran: 他想象她留着黑油油的长辫子的样子。

example.ex: I never would have pictured this as her home...
example.tran: 我怎么也想不出她的家会是这样。

entry.def: A picture of something is a description of it or an indication of what it is like.

example.ex: I'll try and give you a better picture of what the boys do...
example.tran: 我会试着更清楚地向你描述一下这些男孩子都干些什么。

example.ex: Her book paints a bleak picture of the problems women now face...
example.tran: 她的书是女性当下所面临问题的凄凉写照。

entry.def: When you refer to the picture in a particular place, you are referring to the situation there.

example.ex: But as with other charitable bodies, these figures mask the true picture...
example.tran: 但和其他慈善机构一样，这些数字掩盖了实情。

example.ex: It's a similar picture across the border in Ethiopia.
example.tran: 在边界那边的埃塞俄比亚，情况也大致相似。

entry.tran: （尤指通过他人描述）弄明白情况，了解情形
entry.def: If you get the picture, you understand the situation, especially one which someone is describing to you.

example.ex: Luke never tells you the whole story, but you always get the picture.
example.tran: 卢克从不告诉你事情的来龙去脉，但你总会弄明白是怎么回事。

entry.tran: 牵涉其中/不涉其中；在局内/在局外
entry.def: If you say that someone is in the picture, you mean that they are involved in the situation that you are talking about. If you say that they are out of the picture, you mean that they are not involved in the situation.

example.ex: Meyerson is back in the picture after disappearing in July...
example.tran: 迈耶森在7月份消失后现在又掺和了进来了。

example.ex: Sometimes security was so tight that people who might have had something important to offer were left out of the picture.
example.tran: 有时安全措施过于严密，使本来可能会提供重要情况的人成了局外人。

entry.tran: （形容模样）健康的化身/痛苦的典型
entry.def: You use picture to describe what someone looks like. For example, if you say that someone is a picture of health or the picture of misery, you mean that they look extremely healthy or extremely miserable.

example.ex: We found her standing on a chair, the picture of terror, screaming hysterically.
example.tran: 我们发现她站在一把椅子上，满脸恐惧地发出歇斯底里的尖叫。

entry.tran: 使了解内情；向…介绍情况
entry.def: If you put someone in the picture, you tell them about a situation which they need to know about.

example.ex: Has Inspector Fayard put you in the picture?
example.tran: 法亚尔督察把情况都告诉你了吗？

means.word_mean: 1. a visual representation (of an object or scene or person or abstraction) produced on a surface;

sentences.sentence: "they showed us the pictures of their wedding"
"a movie is a series of images projected so rapidly that the eye integrates them"

means.word_mean: 2. graphic art consisting of an artistic composition made by applying paints to a surface;

sentences.sentence: "a small painting by Picasso"
"he bought the painting as an investment"
"his pictures hang in the Louvre"

means.word_mean: 3. a clear and telling mental image;

sentences.sentence: "he described his mental picture of his assailant"
"he had no clear picture of himself or his world"
"the events left a permanent impression in his mind"

means.word_mean: 4. a situation treated as an observable object;

sentences.sentence: "the political picture is favorable"
"the religious scene in England has changed in the last century"

means.word_mean: 5. illustrations used to decorate or explain a text;

sentences.sentence: "the dictionary had many pictures"

means.word_mean: 6. a form of entertainment that enacts a story by a sequence of images giving the illusion of continuous movement;

sentences.sentence: "they went to a movie every Saturday night"
"the film was shot on location"

means.word_mean: 7. the visible part of a television transmission;

sentences.sentence: "they could still receive the sound but the picture was gone"

means.word_mean: 8. a graphic or vivid verbal description;

sentences.sentence: "too often the narrative was interrupted by long word pictures"
"the author gives a depressing picture of life in Poland"
"the pamphlet contained brief characterizations of famous Vermonters"

means.word_mean: 9. a typical example of some state or quality;

sentences.sentence: "the very picture of a modern general"
"she was the picture of despair"

means.word_mean: 1. imagine; conceive of; see in one's mind;

sentences.sentence: "I can't see him on horseback!"
"I can see what will happen"
"I can see a risk in this strategy"

means.word_mean: 2. show in, or as in, a picture;

sentences.sentence: "This scene depicts country life"
"the face of the child is rendered with much tenderness in this painting"

auth_sentence.content: So why is such a misleading picture being painted?
auth_sentence.res_content: So why is such a misleading picture being painted?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So why is such a misleading picture being painted?

auth_sentence.content: That's the most basic picture of his work.
auth_sentence.res_content: That's the most basic picture of his work.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's the most basic picture of his work.

auth_sentence.content: Let's see a larger piece of this picture.
auth_sentence.res_content: Let's see a larger piece of this picture.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Let's see a larger piece of this picture.

stems_affixes.word_buile: pict描画+o+graph写→用图画写→象形文字
pict描画+ure表名词→n.画,图片;影片;美景 v.画,描述,想象
de加强+pict画图→成为画图→描绘
pict描画+ure表名词→n.画,图片;影片;美景 v.画,描述,想象

Sentence.sentence: However, the basic picture is there from the beginning.
The picture worsens with each round of El Nino, the unusually warm currents in the Pacific Ocean that drive up temperatures and invariably presage (预示) droughts and fires in the rain forest.
Self-image is the picture you have of yourself, the sort of person you believe you are.
But self-image is more than how you picture yourself; it also involves how others see you

means.word_mean: 图画, 绘画; 肖像, 照片, 相片

sentences.en: All the pictures should be faced forward.
sentences.cn: 所有的图片都应朝前摆。

sentences.en: The stamp bears the picture of George Washington.
sentences.cn: 这张邮票上印有乔治·华盛顿的肖像。

means.word_mean: (生动的)描述, 写照, 描绘

sentences.en: The writer paints a vivid picture of his early life.
sentences.cn: 那位作家生动地描绘了他早年的生活。

means.word_mean: 影片; 电影; 画面

sentences.en: This picture attracts a large audience.
sentences.cn: 这部影片吸引了大量的观众。

means.word_mean: 美景, 景色

sentences.en: The park is a picture when flowers are in bloom.
sentences.cn: 当鲜花盛开时, 这个公园的景色美极了。

means.word_mean: 情况, 事态, 局面, 状况, 情形, 形势

sentences.en: It is hard to form a true picture of conditions in that country.
sentences.cn: 很难想像那个国家的真实情况。

means.word_mean: 绘画; 描绘

sentences.en: The speaker pictured the suffering of the poor vividly.
sentences.cn: 演讲者很生动地描述了穷人的生活。

sentences.en: Please picture what you have seen at the park for me.
sentences.cn: 请为我描述你在公园里看到的景象。

sentences.en: They pictured their manager as a buffoon.
sentences.cn: 他们把经理描绘成一个小丑。

means.word_mean: 想像; 设想; 忆起

sentences.en: He could picture all too easily the consequences of being caught.
sentences.cn: 他能很容易地想像被抓住的后果。

sentences.en: I can't quite picture him as a family man.
sentences.cn: 我很难想像他是个有家室的人。

jushi.english: The photographer grouped the family together so that he could get them all in the same picture.
jushi.chinese: 摄影师把全家人聚拢在一起,以便把他们摄入同一张相片。

jushi.english: The stamp bears the picture of George Washington.
jushi.chinese: 这张邮票上印有乔治·华盛顿的肖像。

jushi.english: She said good-bye and added that she would send us some pictures.
jushi.chinese: 她先道了再见,接着又说她会给我们寄些照片来。
